-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Toolkit for Koshucode
--   
--   Toolkit for handling koshucode data. This package contains executables
--   except for <tt>koshu</tt> command. Please check package
--   <tt>koshucode-baala-calculator</tt> for <tt>koshu</tt> command.
@package koshucode-baala-toolkit
@version 0.163.0.0


-- | Koshucode syntactic tool.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuSyntax

-- | The main function for <tt>koshu-syntax</tt> command.
koshuSyntaxMain :: IO ()
instance GHC.Enum.Bounded Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuSyntax.Option
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuSyntax.Option
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuSyntax.Option
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuSyntax.Option
instance GHC.Show.Show Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuSyntax.Option


-- | RDF-to-Koshucode conversion
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.RDF

-- | Convert RDF graph to list of judges.
judgesFromRdf :: (RDF g, CText c) => RDFTupleType -> g -> [Judge c]

-- | Convert RDF triple to affirmed judge.
judgeFromTriple :: (CText c) => RDFTupleType -> Triple -> Judge c

-- | Type of conversion
data RDFTupleType

-- | Binary relation: <tt>/s</tt> subject and <tt>/o</tt> object.
RDFTuple2 :: RDFTupleType

-- | Ternary relation: <tt>/s</tt> subject, <tt>/p</tt> predicate, and
--   <tt>/o</tt> object.
RDFTuple3 :: RDFTupleType
instance GHC.Enum.Bounded Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.RDF.RDFTupleType
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.RDF.RDFTupleType
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.RDF.RDFTupleType
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.RDF.RDFTupleType
instance GHC.Show.Show Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.RDF.RDFTupleType


-- | RDF-to-Koshucode converter.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuRdf

-- | The main function for <tt>koshu-rdf</tt> command.
koshuRdfMain :: IO ()
instance GHC.Enum.Bounded Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuRdf.Option
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuRdf.Option
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuRdf.Option
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuRdf.Option
instance GHC.Show.Show Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuRdf.Option


-- | Input resources.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Input

-- | Input resource.
data Input
Stdin :: Input
File :: FilePath -> Input

-- | Input name.
inputText :: Input -> String

-- | Read input resource.
readInput :: Input -> IO String

-- | Read multiple input resources.
readInputs :: [Input] -> IO [String]

-- | Read input code and extract judges.
readJudge :: String -> [JudgeC]
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Input.Input
instance GHC.Show.Show Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Input.Input


-- | Functions for changes between two datasets.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Change

-- | Read, calculate, and write judges <i>B</i> minus <i>A</i>.
minusInput :: Input -> Input -> IO ExitCode

-- | Read and calculate judges subtraction.
minusInputJudge :: Input -> Input -> IO [JudgeC]

-- | Calculate subtraction of judges.
minusJudge :: (Ord c) => [Judge c] -> [Judge c] -> [Judge c]

-- | Calculate and write judges <i>B</i> update by <i>C</i>.
updateInput :: Input -> Input -> IO ExitCode

-- | Apply change judges.
updateJudge :: (Ord c) => [Judge c] -> [Judge c] -> [Judge c]


-- | Changeset.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuChange

-- | The main function for <tt>koshu-change</tt> command.
koshuChangeMain :: IO ExitCode
instance GHC.Enum.Bounded Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuChange.Option
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuChange.Option
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuChange.Option
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuChange.Option
instance GHC.Show.Show Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuChange.Option
